languages.text: "Ах ты гнилоутробный выродок! Использовал меня словно бойцового зверя?! Натравил на своих врагов?!" {n}Лицо Ульфара темнеет от гнева, но он немыслимым усилием загоняет его внутрь и каким-то чудом удерживается от приступа кровавого безумия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ах ты гнилоутробный выродок! Использовал меня словно бойцового зверя?! Натравил на своих врагов?!" {n}Лицо Ульфара темнеет от гнева, но он немыслимым усилием загоняет его внутрь и каким-то чудом удерживается от приступа кровавого безумия.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ах ты гнилоутробный выродок! Использовал меня словно бойцового зверя?! Натравил на своих врагов?!" {n}Лицо Ульфара темнеет от гнева, но он немыслимым усилием загоняет его внутрь и каким-то чудом удерживается от приступа кровавого безумия.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “啊，你这头该死的臭猪！你把我当成杀人工具，对不对？你让我去对付你的敌人？”{n}乌尔法愤怒不已，脸色也变得阴沉下来，但他拼命抑制着他的怒火，防止血腥的愤怒冲昏他的头脑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “啊，你这头该死的臭猪！你把我当成杀人工具，对不对？你让我去对付你的敌人？”{n}乌尔法愤怒不已，脸色也变得阴沉下来，但他拼命抑制着他的怒火，防止血腥的愤怒冲昏他的头脑。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «¡Agh, rata traicionera! ¡Me has usado como una bestia de guerra! ¡Me has azuzado contra tus enemigos!». {n}La furia oscurece la expresión de Ulfar, pero, con un esfuerzo titánico, consigue contenerla y evitar un baño de sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Agh, rata traicionera! ¡Me has usado como una bestia de guerra! ¡Me has azuzado contra tus enemigos!». {n}La furia oscurece la expresión de Ulfar, pero, con un esfuerzo titánico, consigue contenerla y evitar un baño de sangre.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「クソ、腐りきった悪党め！俺を戦う獣として利用したのか？お前の敵に俺を仕向けたのか？」{n}ウルファーの表情はみるみる曇ったが、渾身の力でそれを抑え込み、怒りに支配されるのをなんとか防いだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「クソ、腐りきった悪党め！俺を戦う獣として利用したのか？お前の敵に俺を仕向けたのか？」{n}ウルファーの表情はみるみる曇ったが、渾身の力でそれを抑え込み、怒りに支配されるのをなんとか防いだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Argh, Ihr verfluchtes Schwein! Ihr habt mich als Kriegsbestie genutzt, ja? Mich auf Eure Feinde gehetzt?" {n}Ulfars Gesicht verdüstert sich vor Zorn, doch mit gewaltiger Anstrengung schluckt er die Wut hinunter und verhindert, dass der Blutrausch ihn übermannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Argh, Ihr verfluchtes Schwein! Ihr habt mich als Kriegsbestie genutzt, ja? Mich auf Eure Feinde gehetzt?" {n}Ulfars Gesicht verdüstert sich vor Zorn, doch mit gewaltiger Anstrengung schluckt er die Wut hinunter und verhindert, dass der Blutrausch ihn übermannt.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, espèce de porc putride ! Vous vous êtes servi de moi comme d'un animal de guerre, alors ? Pour m'envoyer combattre vos adversaires ? » {n}Le visage d'Ulfar s'assombrit de colère, mais au prix d'un effort colossal, il parvient à retrouver son calme et à ne pas entrer dans une rage sanguinaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ah, espèce de porc putride ! Vous vous êtes servi de moi comme d'un animal de guerre, alors ? Pour m'envoyer combattre vos adversaires ? » {n}Le visage d'Ulfar s'assombrit de colère, mais au prix d'un effort colossal, il parvient à retrouver son calme et à ne pas entrer dans une rage sanguinaire.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Groks bozması it seni! Savaşında benden istifade ettin demek! Düşmanlarının üstüne mi saldın beni?" {n}Hiddetlenen Ulfar'ın yüzü düşse de büyük bir efor sarf ederek kendini zorluyor ve öfkeden gözünün dönmesine engel oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Agh, you rotten-gutted swine! Used me as a war beast, did you? Set me on your enemies?" {n}Ulfar's face darkens in fury, but with gargantuan effort he forces it down and manages to prevent a fit of blood rage from taking hold.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Groks bozması it seni! Savaşında benden istifade ettin demek! Düşmanlarının üstüne mi saldın beni!" {n}Hiddetten Ulfar'ın yüzü düşüyor ama büyük bir efor sarf ederek kendini zorluyor ve öfkeden gözünün dönmesine engel oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
